About Me

I’m a dedicated professional with over eight years of management experience in the pet cremation industry.
Recently, I’ve transitioned into the tech field, where I’m harnessing my problem-solving abilities and leadership skills.
My journey into tech is driven by a passion for innovation. and a commitment to continuous learning.
